mapper.update: update video set VIDEO_NAME = #{videoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO_ADDRESS = #{videoAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where VIDEO_ID = #{videoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select VIDEO_ID, VIDEO_NAME, VIDEO_ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LABEL, CREATE_TIME from video
